snippet.title: The Bouncer (Newscast) Japanese Commercial
snippet.description:
Square went all in marketing The Bouncer's cinematic appeal, touting its use of the DVD format, a key feature which made the PlayStation 2 such a success. Say what you want about the finished product, but this beatemup brought the pre-launch hype.

Visit chrislovesjapan.com for more content.

My transcription of the audio:
DVDでゲームする快感
バウンサー
